title: Bubble World

description.title: Description
description.lead: Build the longest words from letters hidden in bubbles that gently float upwards. The faster you think, the higher you score — levels get harder as time shortens.

how.title: How to play
how.caption: Catch, combine, score
how.intro: Master the basics and start making big words:
items: Tap or drag to catch floating letter bubbles.
Combine letters to form the longest words you can.
Confirm the word before bubbles drift away to score points.

strategy.title: Strategy & scoring
strategy.caption: Think fast, think long
strategy.intro: Longer words mean more points — speed matters as levels advance:
items: Prioritize rare letters to boost your total.
Plan ahead: keep a vowel ready to extend words.
Higher levels shorten the time — stay focused and react quickly.

features.title: Features
features.caption: Why you'll like it
features.p: Playful learning meets smooth arcade action:
items: Train letters, words and quick thinking

keywords: Keywords: word game, letters, vocabulary, bubbles, educational, reflex, quick thinking, arcade word puzzle
